body.name: Foldable Ironing Board with Heat Resistant Cover, Steam Iron Rest and Non-Slip Legs - Sturdy Metal Frame (13 x 34 x 53 Inches) (Silver Gray)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Sturdy Medal Frame: The BKTD ironing board is designed with a sturdy and stable metal frame and non-slip legs. Provide you with a safe and comfortable ironing experience.
Easy Storage: The iron stand can be folded for storage. Easy to use, move and store. Absolute space saver. Can be stored with an iron board holder or stored behind door.
Iron Rest Space: Include premium steam iron rest area to keep a good heat dissipation. Convenient for use when you want to take a break.
Heat Resistant Cover: The ironing board cover is 100% heat resistant. It is washable and reusable. You can also put another colorful cover on it if you like.
Dimensions: 13*34*53 inches when unfolded. For storage, the package is 55*3*14 inches when packaged. Product weight is about 10lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must-have ironing board of superior quality!
reviews.reviewText: I really love this ironing board; it has exceeded my expectations completely. I especially adore its design, which is even better than I anticipated. The appearance is elegant and high-end, and I also love the color. Moreover, the material is very sturdy; the steel frame is made of stainless steel and feels smooth and robust to the touch. The overall product is stable and doesn't wobble, and it can be adjusted according to different heights. Another pleasant surprise is the iron rest area, where I can place the iron when taking a break.This product is also very easy to store; I keep it next to the cabinet, and it doesn't take up much space. The ironing board cover feels great as well; it is heat resistant, and underneath the cover, there are two layers of foam. The cover can be removed, washed and replaced. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this product, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a good ironing board!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and well padded
reviews.reviewText: The reviews I read were accurate. This is a sturdy ironing board that is well padded. My basis for comparison is my roughly 20 year old ironing board that I probably bought for $20 that has long since lost any padding which has reduced to merely cloth over metal, so bear that in mind. But I think it's well padded 😀. It's a little heavier than my old one because of the thick metal legs, but that's why it's so sturdy and I think it's worth the tradeoff. Plus, I'm talking like 2lbs heavier, so not very heavy overall. The surface grips really well, sort of like sandpaper, which I'm not used to. I think I like it, and so far I don't see any damage to my clothes and hope it stays that way. I thought the price was pretty ridiculous for what this is, but I did my research and at least on Amazon it seems like most ironing boards are a lot more expensive than what I remember and this one is certainly not the most expensive so I think it's probably worth spending $20 to $30 more for this one than the cheapest ones that have poor reviews. I'm planning on keeping this one for another 20 years 😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked at the prices of some ironing boards. No need to pay so much. This is a very sturdy, good quality board. The rack on the end is great for hanging shirts and resting the iron. I do wish the company would make a model with a detachable rack or no rack. I like to use that end of the iron for shirts. This board is solid and made to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and easy to use. Very sturdy for my use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Beautifully Ironing board with great quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A very beautiful ironing board, with a metallic texture, looks very attractive and high end. The overall design is very compact, easy to store, and doesn’t take up much space. It is also very lightweight. There is a space to let iron rest, which won’t damage the cover. A very satisfying purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase
reviews.reviewText: I read many reviews for many ironing boards. I wanted something large enough to iron fabrics. I wasn't sure how I'd like the extended plate to rest the iron onto but it's works out perfectly; gives me more space on the board and I can lay the iron flat. It's not flimsy, sturdy yet not heavy and doesn't teeter. Glad I made the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ironing board.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great home ironing board. It is quit sturdy and very easy to use. The extra shelf and hot iron pad are very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small board. Perfect for the sewing room!
The price is adequate for the quality of the product. The iron board is sturdy and solid. The size is perfect. Very happy with this product.

BKTD ironing boards are super durable and made of high quality metal materials. It is well packaged and looks beautiful. Great length, adjustable height and use of safety lock. The ironing rest area is designed to be perfect for resting.It's light, very pretty, and I absolutely love it. It is foldable and very easy to carry and store.When received, the ironing cover has a little wrinkle due to shrink wrap, which is unavoidable. This is not a problem at all for me, I iron the cover carefully before using it. And the ironing cover becomes flat and beautiful.Definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good, just a bit shorter than I would like
reviews.reviewText: Actually really good and hit most of my requirements. Just felt it was a little too pricey but it is what it is I guess. It was a little shorter than I would’ve liked as well. I like standing to iron my clothes and I’m about 173cm and this worked well but I would have to bend more than I would like to use it. All in all pretty good.
Works great. Its an ironing board so I dont know why you are reading reviews, just buy it.

I like the height, overall neutral colour, and the easy of foldup of this ironing board. I managed to put it into a narrow section between storage and it fit perfectly. It's basic but big and high enough, which is perfect.
